insert right needle knitwise into next each row referred to as sections you will always two stitches on left needle and knit them together work these three sections a total of twice per row without dropping the stitches off left needle insert right needle knitwise into first stitch on left round 1 needle and knit this stitch drop both stitches off section 1 k1 sl1wyif x7 rt the needle section 2
